PROJECTS.TITLE: PROJECTS
PROJECTS.MonkeyType: Clone of the Monkey Type website to practice typing speed and accuracy, providing performance metrics such as words per minute (WPM) and accuracy.
PROJECTS.ToDoList: Website to create, modify, delete and save your pending tasks, with the option to filter them by progress, or by name.
PROJECTS.FormularioValidaciones: Simple form in which validations are made to know if the requested data are being entered correctly.

CONTACT.TITLE: CONTACT
CONTACT.TEXT: Hi! If you liked my portfolio and want to contact me to work together on projects or develop an idea, feel free to write me through the following means.
